Description: Postcard; printed paper; colour photograph showing four views of Egypt;1: Port Said government building (top left); 2: the little temple of Hathor at Abu Simbel ((top right); 3: the sphinx at Giza illuminated at nigh (bottom right); 4: a hotel pool and the river Nile at Aswan (bottom left).
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Port Said, Government building
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr St John Simpson
